item.title: Telegraf-influxDB-Grafana stack for IoT stuff in docker
item.description: TL;TR Explore the platform - Telegraf, InfluxDB and Grafana (TIG). Advantages: i. True IoT setup. Data ingestion happens in millisenconds via telegraf. Telegraf can be added as a windowns service, which means restart computer won’t destroy the workflow. ii. Time series database, super efficient. iii. Full interactive dashboard with drag and drop buidling mechnism. Disadvantages: i. Telegraf configuration. ii. InfluxDB query lanuage. Docker-compose files for a simple uptodate InfluxDB + Grafana stack + Telegraf Get the stack (only once):
